synonyms: hiraṇyagarbha—named Hiraṇyagarbha; antaryāmī—the Supersoul; garbha-udaka-śāyī—Lord Garbhodakaśāyī Viṣṇu; sahasra-śīrṣā-ādi kari'-by the Vedic hymns beginning with sahasra-śīrṣā (Ṛg Veda-saṁhitā 10.90); vede yāṅre ga-i—unto whom the Vedas pray.
translation: "Garbhodakaśāyī Viṣṇu, known within the universe as Hiraṇyagarbha and the antaryāmī, or Supersoul, is glorified in the Vedic hymns, beginning with the hymn that starts with the word sahasra-śīrṣā.
